moving

Class Background

  • java.lang.Object
    • moving.Background

  • public class Background
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the background, drawing it, and moving it around.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Background

        public Background(int x,
          int y,
          java.awt.Image img,
          int repeatingType)
        Default constructor. Creates the background.
        Parameters:
        x - X position of the background.
        y - Y position of the background.
        img - The image of the background.
        repeatingType - Indicates how the background repeats. See the final constants above.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(double dX,
          double dY)
        Updates the position and repeats the background correctly.
        Parameters:
        dX - How much the background needs to move in the x-direction.
        dY - How much the background needs to move in the y-direction.

      • drawBackground

        public void drawBackground(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws the background.
        Parameters:
        g - The object on which to draw the graphics.

      • getImage

        public java.awt.Image getImage()
        Fetches the Image of the background.
        Returns:
        The Image of the background.

      • getRepeatType

        public int getRepeatType()
        Fetches the repeat type of the background.
        Returns:
        The repeat type of the background.
